document.full_text: a british minister said on wednesday that more than a quarter of the world's population was expected to watch television broadcasts of this month's royal wedding between prince william and kate middleton.
document.title: uk minister says 2 billion to watch royal wedding
lines_and_colors: a british minister said on wednesday that more than a quarter of the world's population was expected to watch television broadcasts of this month's royal wedding between prince william and kate middleton.
